availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander Scott Clephane (Newport, Campbell County, Kentucky, plasterer, produce dealer, and merchant.)

body.p: Newport, Campbell County, Kentucky, plasterer produce dealer, and merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Clephane and Sarah Clephane. Married to Martha J. Clephane. Father of Jessie Clephane and Alexander Clephane. Plasterer in Newport, Campbell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Produce dealer in Newport, Campbell County, in 1860. Merchant in Campbell County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 66B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 447.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Columbia, p. 287A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Campbell County, KY, June & July 1863, p. 74.
"Alexander Scott Clephane Sr. (1832-1923)," Find A Grave, Memorial #13420739, accessed August 29, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/13420739.
